title: Avokaya (1986) Genesis Portion
description: Avokaya translation of the first four chapters of Genesis published by the Avokaya Bible Translation Committee and the Sudan Bible Translation and Literacy Association. Avokaya is a tribal language of Sudan.
provider: Sudan Bible Translation and Literacy Association

language.name: Avokaya
language.area: South, Western Equatorial Province. Ajugu is on Sudan-Congo border south of Maridi; Ojila mainly between Naam (Era) and Olo rivers and east. Also in Democratic Republic of the Congo.
